Welcome to penguins!¬∂

üêß Penguins: an Easy and NullPointerException-free Gateway to Unpacking and Illustrating NMR Spectra üêß

import penguins as pg
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

example_spec = pg.read("data/exam2d_HC/", 3, 1)
pg.plot2d(example_spec,
          contour_levels=(1e6, None, None),
          contour_colors=("blue", "red"))
plt.xlim(7.4, 0.6)
plt.ylim(133.8, 6.8)
plt.show()
